item.title: Trump DHS links data for new citizenship tracking tool. And, Senate discusses tax bill

item.title: Click, speak, move: These brain implants are poised to help people with disabilities
item.description: People who can no longer move or speak may soon have a new option: an implanted device that links their brain to a computer.

item.title: This company wants to be the first to mine the ocean floor, with Trump's help

item.title: In effort to protect children, France bans smoking at parks and beaches
item.description: Smokers are no longer allowed to light up in public parks, at swimming pools, or at beaches, or "anywhere children may be present," said French health...

item.title: Decades later, Karen de Boer still remembers a kind gesture from her college hallmate
